entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:24 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:39 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
